price: 111. Nabiyow Yallay baxa hay site weeh, Rccdal agleyta sinniih, isi ginok awlaytuy xixxibaanck kaa cata sinnih fayla dabqis, dudda Íe kaxxa nabnah kaa eyneb qibaada kaah caglisak.
arabic: وَقُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لَمۡ يَتَّخِذۡ وَلَدٗا وَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُۥ شَرِيكٞ فِي ٱلۡمُلۡكِ وَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُۥ وَلِيّٞ مِّنَ ٱلذُّلِّۖ وَكَبِّرۡهُ تَكۡبِيرَۢا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waquli al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī lam yattakhidh waladan walam yakun lahu sharīkun fī al-mul'ki walam yakun lahu waliyyun mina al-dhuli wakabbir'hu takbīran
